reviewText: Aota Academy girls volleyball team and their coach, Akira. The girls have to win the championship. A new student, Nanase approaches the team and criticizes their overall attitude and playing techniques, pissing off the girls leader. Nanase is challenge to prove her worth to the team, and she does so, but only after making out with Coach Akira. As it turns out, Nanase need some loving so she can get fired up to play at her best.
